original_title: Will President Vladimir Putin be arrested? – Prof. Wasantha Seneviratne – Senior Lecturer (University of Colombo).
original_body_lines: Will President Vladimir Putin be arrested? – Prof. Wasantha Seneviratne – Senior Lecturer Department of Public & International Law, Faculty of Law, University of Colombo.
